replies.body: But riot will never {{champion:64}}

> Karthus's dance audio is no longer global for allies

I can no longer play mid lane anymore.
Remember when they took away Robot Amumu's ability to global laugh :[

**Patch 6.2** Elise: With Runic Echoes, Elise has just the tool she needs to climb the waterspout of power rankings, and there ain't no rain to wash her out
BASE HUMAN FORM MOVEMENT SPEED 330 ⇒ 325
BASE SPIDER FORM MOVEMENT SPEED 355 ⇒ 350

**Patch 6.4 **Runic echos Movespeed nerf.
Aaaaaaaaaand no elise change?

Classic Nerf champ>>> Nerf Item >>> Leave champ in weaker state

If you cared to actually do some investigating before complaining on here you would have seen that Riot has stated on the boards that they feel Elise will still be in a good spot after Runic Echoes nerf and if they find that she needs a little love they will do something about it. 

Don't get all self righteous before the patch goes through. If you find that she indeed needs a small buff to compensate then make a polite post on the boards explaining why you believe she needs a little something or other.
Love how you get downvoted when Riot LITERALLY said what you said, you're not even bullshitting I saw the Elise post xD
lol I find it humorous.  Some people just don't care, they are too busy grabbing their pitch forks and jumping on the "Riot sucks" or "Worst season yet" bandwagons.

It gets really frustrating sometimes. Some of the things people complain about on the boards are just ridiculous, and it's almost always complaints about things they just don't try to _think_ about. They just declare it's trash and start complaining.

Remember {{champion:19}} ?
No? Because riot left him to rot in the dirt like the dog he is.

Except he's like a beginner's jungler. Able to clear the jungle easily and effectively even at lower levels. His kit is clean and sure his E is next to useless, but it's simple enough to where anyone can pick him up and do at least somewhat decent.
His e is almost his best skill. It's practically a maphack. It also lets you get to fights super quickly enabling you to farm and still be able to countergank.

Except that Warwick is in a really good spot...

He has a 52% win rate in Plat and higher.

He's like perfectly balanced right now.

Warwick 52% winrate = perfectly balanced
Tahm Kench 49% winrate = better nerf three times

That's because winrate isn't actually a good gauge of balance. 

_The more you know._

Increase movespeed by 10%
Decrease movespeed by 1.5%
Decrease movespeed by 3%
Yep, gutted boys
Riot said that they believe Elise will still be fine and if it turns out they are wrong they will look into buffing her back up.
Riot specifically said Elise is strong enough after the Runic Echoes nerf where they don't want to buff her MS to compensate. Elise is ridiculously strong right now.

>GOLD PLUNDERED ~~4/5/7/6/8 gold~~ ⇒ 2/3/4/5/6 gold

What kind of scaling was that?
5/7/6
{{champion:2}}  Warlord's Bloodlust....Hahahahahahaha.
The {{champion:112}} nerf is very unnecessary. if you want to nerf a mage nerf {{champion:99}}
I see that is it unnecessary but keep in mind it is 20 base damage at level 5. That really won't do much at all to him imo
He's not going to be at risk in lane. His damage is abrely lowered at the lpwer ranks.
Where's the {{item:3124}}  nerfs? :| It's not the Champions that keep getting nerfed that are the problem ({{champion:5}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:96}} ) It's Guinsoos Rageblade.

Don't worry, once those champions who currently buy Rageblade now have to buy the item to remain relevant (due to all the nerfs to said champions), they'll go ahead and nerf Rageblade without giving compensatory buffs back to the affected champions.

Welcome to Riot "balancing".

Um, you're saying there's a glitch when illaoi gets displaced/disables during her leap of faith, so your just making her immune while casting it? How is that fixing the glitch? That just sounds like you're making an already frustrating champ to play against even harder to kite.

As if she's hard to kite in the first place? She has 0 movement abilities and only one **skillshot** to slow you down and catch up to you, and it's not like her R is a dash, it's an up and down. There's a reason no one plays her and I'm glad she's receiving a buff.
I 100% agree with this comment. #BuffIllaoi
I read that as #Buffalo at first.

>  Ezreal's global nuke

Nuke only if AP otherwise it tickles.  Meanwhile, while not global, Lux is shooting off massive nukes every 29 seconds.  Fair how?
Lux don't have a {{summoner:4}} every 10 sec.

"viktor's been strong for many patches, so nerf"

Lulu? How about Lulu? Are you going to continue nerfing all control mages EXCEPT Lulu? Azir's been dead for a while, and nothing is given for him. Now by taking Viktor's base damage, he won't be able to clear waves properly at early stages of the game, taking away his main power and his way to survive the early game, so Viktor's just gonna die. Meanwhile, Lulu can just stay there untouched for 2 seasons.
I swear to god if I see 99.9% of every game with Lulu and Alistar for yet another season, I'm going to just lose it.
Wow, I hardly ever see Lulu.
Lulu has been dominant in the pro scene since forever and yet Riot refuses to touch her in comparison to Viktor(???) who has seen a spotlight for only a few months.
Assuming you don't play in the pro scene, how often do you see Lulu in your games?  Because the only time I see her is when I pick her, and I play her support.

His early laser damage was barely touched. And the most it goes down to is -20 at rank 5. So it won't hurt much but it will be noticeable (only 5 less damage at rank 2). Lulu def needs to go though. Way too strong for her own good.
I like the new direction of the Iceborn Gauntlet change. It really is meant to be a tank/bruiser item.
Goodbye GP, you were fun while you lasted {{item:3070}} {{champion:41}} {{item:3070}}

{{champion:41}} 
Q - Parrrley 
~~ GOLD PLUNDERED 4/5/7/6/8 gold ⇒ 2/3/4/5/6 gold ~~
Q the enemy laner to get gold from bandit like you were supposed to be doing in the first place.

He's still good, they didn't really do much to him. Reduced gold generation which is fine because he will still generate more than most even from behind. The amount of barrels is also okay because it means you need to be more selective with your barrel placements instead of throwing them down like hotcakes and popping people for nearly 1k if not more. 4 seconds reduced at late game too is nice.

{{item:3070}} {{champion:30}} 

wat am i suppose to spam nao?

NEW CHAMPION CONFIRMED! NIDALLE!

(Bugfixes: Fixed a framerate issue that occurred when an enemy Challenger Nidalle entered vision)
Well, at least the Statue of karthus dance is still global for enimies.
Statue of Karthus nerfs

**Why does it still get applied after the dash?** _"Charm no longer interrupts dashes (Charm will still apply after their movement ends)"_ 
If you made it in line with other CCs it's duration would be part of the dash, like how you can Rek'Sai tunnel during a Dark Binding or Trist jump during a stun if you buffer it and you're able to move after your dash because by then the CC is over. **Is Ahri getting special treatment, or should you fix all other CCs in the game to apply their effects after the dash is over?
**

Edit: Glad to get downvoted by all the butthurt Ahri mains out there for asking a question. BTW glad your shit champ got nerfed. Stay salty kids.

No, its still like that. Like, if as Trist you jump as taric stun is slowly following you, the stun doesn't disappear, just applies after you jump. The cc always procs after dashes, this is nothing new.

Ahri Nerf: Riot this nerf is not intended for regular Ahri players. Less than 15% of Ahri players are able to land their charm mid dash. This mechanic punishes the players who have donated a lot of time and effort into  mastering Ahri. Instead of getting rewarded by being able to make insane plays like this: [Verti](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J932qz2lsCw) we are getting punished by loosing our ability to outplay our bad matchups!! {{champion:7}} {{champion:131}} 

Riot Please reconsider for all the Ahri fans and mains out there <3 {{champion:103}}  {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}}  Long live Ahri
